Package: org.codehaus.groovy.grails.orm.hibernate.cfg

[Java] Class GrailsAnnotationConfiguration

      • org.codehaus.groovy.grails.orm.hibernate.cfg.GrailsAnnotationConfiguration
      • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
        ApplicationContextAware, GrailsDomainConfiguration, InitializingBean

        public class GrailsAnnotationConfiguration
extends Configuration

        Allows configuring Grails' hibernate support to work in conjuntion with Hibernate's annotation support.

        Authors:
        Graeme Rocher
        Since:
        18-Feb-2006

            Perform Spring-based scanning for entity classes, registering them as annotated classes with this Configuration.

            throws:

            Parameters:
            packagesToScan - one or more Java package names
